body: This amulet, usually containing some type of magically preserved monster hide or other natural armor—such as bone, horn, carapace, or beast scales—toughens the wearer's body and flesh, giving him an enhancement bonus to his natural armor from +1 to +5, depending on the kind of amulet.
name: Amulet of Natural Armor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Neck/Neck Slot Wondrous Items/Amulet of Natural Armor
